room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape in 60 in Charleston
review: Awesome experience for a first escape room! We did the Prison Escape. Great staff, cool puzzles!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape in 60 in Charleston
review: Did this just the wife and I. We were so close to escaping the prison, were on the last clue when time ran out. It was so much fun, we decided to come back to do another room an hour later!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape in 60 in Charleston
review: We did the prison escape and went in totally blind not knowing what to expect. Even after receiving directions I was a little unsure. However, with 8 people in the room, we shortly started to make sense of the clues. Overall it was a nice activity to do with friends. And we did escape!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape in 60 in Charleston
review: What a great time we had here! The staff was very kind and helpful. It's in a very convenient location. We did the "Prison Break" room and found it very challenging although it's for all audiences. I look forward to returning to the adult room for an extra challenge. Highly recommend this place!
